QuestData.Title: Block the Gates
QuestData.Description: If we're to have a shot against Abyssion, we must make sure he receives no aid from reinforcements.$B$BYou will find two gateways in his lair to the east. Use this stormstone to disrupt their operation.$B$BIf everything goes as planned, we'll be able to tackle Abyssion without him being able to receive much assistance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Stormstone at the Twilight Gate and Elemental Gate in Abyssion's Lair.
QuestData.CompletionText: You've returned, $n. Are the gates closed?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. When we make our move against Abyssion, we should be able to do so without reinforcements coming to his aid.
